original_title: Nasceu o Bebê Diabo em São Paulo
overview: An investigation into three São Paulo urban legends: The Devil Baby, the Blonde of the Bathroom and the Clown Gang. Originated in rumours, they were reported by the extinct tabloid Notícias Populares (NP) at different times. From this search, a universe is revealed where fantasy and reality are confused.
title: The Devil Baby Was Born in São Paulo
